Title: Pompeii
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, History, Romance
Writer: Janet Scott Batchler (screenplay), Lee Batchler (screenplay), Michael Robert Johnson (screenplay)
Actors: Dylan Schombing, Jean-Francois Lachapelle, Rebecca Roberts, Kiefer Sutherland
Plot: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.
